Key Match Events: Spain took the lead with a goal by Dani Olmo in the 51st minute.
Germany equalized in the 89th minute with a goal by Florian Wirtz.
Mikel Merino scored the winning goal for Spain in the 119th minute of extra time.
Dani Carvajal was sent off after receiving a second yellow card.
Post-Match Reflections: Dani Olmo stated, 'The heart is always more important than the legs. Let's take it easy and calmly, because in four days we have the semifinals.'
Mikel Merino expressed exhaustion from the match and praised his teammates' perseverance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at MHPArena in Stuttgart, Germany.
The game was played in front of a majority of German fans.
Others: The match was covered by FOX and attended by 54,000 fans.
The game was part of Euro 2024 quarterfinals.
